resources.string:
Changes in MkIIIv53

This (oldgood) flavor has

android.permission.CAMERA must be granted in order to connect to any USB_CLASS_VIDEO device since Android 9: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/hardware/usb/UsbManager.html#requestPermission(android.hardware.usb.UsbDevice,%20android.app.PendingIntent)…

…and has been added.

See issue #29
